name: SMTP_HOST
description: FQDN name or IP Address of the SMTP Server.

name: SMTP_PORT
description: SMTP service TCP/IP port.

name: SSL_ENABLED
description: SMTP SSL protocol enabled or not.

name: SMTP_AUTH_USERNAME
description: SMTP SSL Authentication Username

name: SMTP_AUTH_PASSWORD
description: SMTP SSL Authentication Password (clear text).

name: MAIL_FROM_ADDRESS
description: Mail address of mail origin.

name: MAIL_SUBJECT_SEND_KEY
description: Subject of the sent e-mail with the Private Key, after user creation.

name: MAIL_SUBJECT_SEND_KEY
description: Subject of the sent e-mail with the Private Key, after user creation.
parameterValue: La tua chiave privata per il Whistleblowing

name: MAIL_BODY_SEND_KEY
description: Body of the sent e-mail with the Private Key, after user creation.
parameterValue:
Whistle Blowing Platform

.Attached You'll find your private key, needed to read messages sent to you. Save it on a safe place, do not share it, and use it only for WhistleBlowing platform!

name: MAIL_BODY_SEND_KEY
description: Body of the sent e-mail with the Private Key, after user creation.
parameterValue:
Whistle Blowing Platform

.In allegato, troverai la tua chiave privata, necessaria per leggere i messaggi che ti vengono spediti. Memorizzala in un posto sicuro, non condividerla ed usala solo per la piattaforma di WhistleBlowing!

name: MAIL_SUBJECT_CHANGE_PWD
description: Subject of the sent e-mail after a successful password change.

name: MAIL_SUBJECT_CHANGE_PWD
description: Subject of the sent e-mail after a successful password change.
parameterValue: La tua password per il Whistleblowing è stata cambiata.

name: MAIL_BODY_CHANGE_PWD
description: Body of the sent e-mail after a successful password change.
parameterValue:
Whistle Blowing Platform

.This e-mail confirms you a successful password change for the WhistleBlowing platform!

name: MAIL_BODY_CHANGE_PWD
description: Body of the sent e-mail after a successful password change.
parameterValue:
Whistle Blowing Platform

.Questa e-mail ti conferma l'avvenuto cambio della password di accesso alla piattaforma di WhistleBlowing!

name: MAIL_SUBJECT_NEW_MSG
description: Subject of the sent e-mail after a successful password change.

name: MAIL_SUBJECT_NEW_MSG
description: Subject of the sent e-mail after a successful password change.

name: MAIL_BODY_NEW_MSG
description: Body of the sent e-mail after a successful password change.
parameterValue:
Whistle Blowing Platform

.There is a new message for you on the Whistleblowing Platform!

name: MAIL_BODY_NEW_MSG
description: Body of the sent e-mail after a successful password change.
parameterValue:
Whistle Blowing Platform

.C'é un nuovo messaggio sulla piattaforma di WhistleBlowing!

name: JWT_ISSUER
description: Jwt issuer, the name of application that issues Jwt tokens!

name: JWT_AUDIENCE
description: Jwt audience, the name of application that is the auditor of Jwt tokens!

name: JWT_PASSWORD
description: Jwt password, used to encode/decode tokens. MUST be a 16 chars length string!

name: JWT_TOKEN_EXPIRATION
description: Token life duration (in minutes).

name: MESSAGE_COUNTER_LENGHT
description: Message counter lenght (number of characters).

name: COUNTER_SEPARATOR
description: Separator character between year and counter number.
